GrandeOuverture_GPIO.title: GPIO Physical PIN for big opening
GrandeOuverture_GPIO.description: The GPIO pin the plugin should use to open totally the portail.

GrandeOuverture_CommandHigh.title: Grande Ouverture command polarity
GrandeOuverture_CommandHigh.description: Set to True if the command should be HIGH to activate.

PetiteOuverture_GPIO.title: GPIO Physical PIN for little opening
PetiteOuverture_GPIO.description: The GPIO Physical PIN the plugin should use to open only the small door of the portail.

PetiteOuverture_CommandHigh.title: Petite Ouverture command polarity
PetiteOuverture_CommandHigh.description: Set to True if the command should be HIGH to activate.

Contact_GPIO.title: GPIO Physical PIN for state input
Contact_GPIO.description: The GPIO pin the plugin should use to read the state of the Portail. A HIGH signal will indicate an OPEN garage door.
